data.title: ESPERA ::
data.meta_description: Die ESPERA-WERKE GMBH sind ein international tätiger Hersteller von Preis- und Gewichtsauszeichnungsanlagen für variable und gleichgewichtig auszuzeichnende Packungen. Der Firmensitz befindet sich in Duisburg, Nordrhein-Westfalen.
data.text:
Liability for content

The contents of our sites were created with the greatest care. However we cannot assume liability for correctness, completeness and accuracy. As a service provider, we are responsible for the proprietary content on these sites in accordance with the general laws as per § 7 para. 1 TMG. Pursuant to §§ 8 through 10 TMG, however we are not under the obligation as service provider to monitor transmitted or saved information of third parties or research circumstances that suggest an illegal activity. Obligations for the removal or blocking of the use of information in accordance with the general laws remain unaffected here. Any liability in this respect is, however, only incurred from the moment that knowledge of the specific breach of law is obtained. These contents will be immediately removed upon discovery of any corresponding infringements.

Copyright law

The layout of homepage, graphics and images used, compilation as well as the individual texts are copyrighted. All rights, including the rights of photomechanic reproduction, duplication and the distribution by special systems, even in part, are reserved for the operator of the website. The operator of the website does not assume any guarantee for any sentence errors or the correctness of the entries. All liability claims, which refer to damages of either a material or non-material nature and which result from the content of the sites, are expressly excluded.

Data protection

The use of our website is usually possible without providing personal information. Insofar as personal data is collected on our website (for example name, address or email addresses) this information is provided on a voluntary basis as far as possible. This data will not be passed on to third parties without your express consent.

Please note that the secure transfer of data via Internet (e.g. communication via email) may involve gaps in security. It is not possible to protect such data completely against access from third parties.

We hereby expressly prohibit the use of contact data published as part of our duty to publish an imprint for the purpose of sending us any advertising or informational material that we have not expressly requested. Should the operators of the sites receive unsolicited promotional material, such as spam etc., the operator expressively reserves the right to take legal action.

Das Internet arbeitet als dezentraler Netzwerkverbund mit der Zwischenspeicherung und Weitergabe temporärer Daten. Eine Gewähr für den Ausschluss von Manipulation, von versehentlichem Verfälschen und Gewähr für die Verwendung nur aktueller Daten (z.B. alte Version noch im Cache) auf dem Verbindungsweg Anbieter zu Nutzer kann es zur Zeit daher nicht geben. Auf diese systembedingte Einschränkung weisen wir daher wie folgt hin: Sie erhalten diese Daten unter den Bedingungen des Internet. Für die Richtigkeit der Angaben und die Übereinstimmung mit den Ursprungsdaten kann daher keine Gewähr übernommen werden.

External links

In its judgement dated 12 May 1998, the district court of Hamburg concluded that whosoever publicises a link shall be potentially co-liable for the content of the linked Internet page. This can be prevented only thereby dissociating oneself expressly from these contents. The operator of this homepage has included, on his sites, links to other sites on the Internet. The following shall apply to all these links: Those responsible for the website explicitly state that they have no influence whatsoever on the design and content of the linked sites. Thus they distance themselves explicitly from all the contents of all the linked sites on the homepage and do not make those contents their own. This explanation applies to all the links displayed on this homepage and to all the contents of the sites, which lead to such links.
